text: Novopokrovsky () is a rural locality (a village) in Dmitriyevsky Selsoviet, Zilairsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 65 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 40 km from Zilair, 12 km from Dmitriyevka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Zilairsky District
title: Novopokrovsky, Republic of Bashkortostan
